Title: Establishes an affordable independent senior housing assistance program
Summary: Establishes an affordable independent senior housing assistance program which shall provide grants within amounts appropriated or otherwise available therefor to affordable independent senior housing properties to establish and operate resident assistance programs.
LawCode: Add Art 29-A ยง1265, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to establishing an affordable independent senior housing assistance program
